altTitles.ja: アップデーター～NPCからの成り上がり～

description.en:
The blacksmith NPC ‘Aiden.’

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister ‘Elise’ perished, he swore to himself.

I’ll destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then…!

“You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1”

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator…!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ja:
鍛冶屋のＮPCエイダン。ある日、システム管理者によって村と唯一の家族である妹アリスを消され、自分も消される最中、「こんなシステム、俺がぶっ壊してやる！」そう誓った瞬間、何者かの手によって生き延び管理者権限まで付与された！ 果たして彼は何者になってしまうのか…！！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ko:
대장장이 NPC '에이든＇.
어느 날, 시스템 관리자로 인해 마을 전체가 삭제당하고,
유일한 가족인 여동생 ‘앨리스’와 함께 소멸하던 그는
그 찰나의 순간, 다짐했다.

반드시 내 손으로 이 시스템을 무너뜨리겠노라고.
그때였다…!

“관리자 권한을 획득했습니다. 관리자 Lv. 1”

관리자의 권한을 가지고 다시 깨어난 에이든.
관리자로서의 힘을 기르기 시작하는데...!!

에이든은 과연 어떤 존재가 될 것인가?!

2020년 “콘티왕으로 살아남기” 대상 수상작 <업데이터>

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ru:
Родная деревня главного героя, кузнеца-нпс Эйдена, была подвергнута зачистке модератором системы. В ходе сего бедствия младшая сестра эйдена, эллис, погибает, что становится для него переключателем между мирной жизнью и жизнью, полной жажды во что бы то ни стало уничтожить систему, отобравшую у эйдена его единственную родственницу.
Неожиданно для себя он обретает полномочия модератора и продолжает становиться сильнее, чтобы осуществить задуманное. До какого же уровня сумеет дойти наш герой в погоне за своей целью?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)

title.en: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch: Aqua

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー ぴちぴちピッチ aqua

description.en: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]

Two boys met on a stormy night: Tsukushi, a boy with no special traits at all, and Jin, a soccer genius. On that night, Jin drags Tsukushi into the world of high-school soccer.  
  
  
---
**Won the 40th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2016**
description.vi: Một câu chuyện đẹp về chàng trai nhỏ bé Tsukamoto, tuy cậu còn chả biết cầm bóng nhưng có niềm đam mê bóng đá bất tận, cùng với cậu bạn thiên tài là Kazama, họ vô tình gặp nhau, và cùng nhau chiến thắng! Đây là một manga rất là đáng để đọc, về tinh thần thể thao, về tình bạn, về những người luôn cố gắng vươn lên. Một câu chuyện truyền động lực và "sưởi hồn" đúng nghĩa...
description.pt-br: Dois garotos se reuniram em uma noite de tempestade: Tsukushi, um garoto sem características especiais em tudo, e Jin, um gênio do futebol. Naquela noite, Jin arrasta Tsukushi no mundo do futebol colegial.

title.en: Heika, Kokoro no Koe ga Dadamore desu!

altTitles.ja: 陛下、心の声がだだ漏れです！

altTitles.en: Your Majesty, the Voice of Your Heart Is Leaking!
Your Majesty, the Voice of Your Heart Is Leaking Out!

description.en:
Sietsye, a princess hailing from a small country, traveled a long way to the powerful northern Kingdom of Verscia so as to wed its ruler, the haughty and overbearing Emperor Gaizel.  
  
The lonely Gaizel was a man known as the Ice Emperor, and is as frightening as he is revered. But, when faced with him, his inner thoughts - a sharp contrast to his icy demeanor - drift over to Sietsye, going far beyond her wildest imaginations—?!  
  
Thus begins the story of a love blooming out of a political marriage.
description.ja:
心を閉ざした皇帝と心の声が聞こえる皇妃の、超甘々ファンタジーラブコメ!

北の大国を治める傲岸不遜な皇帝・ガイゼルのもとへ、皇妃となるためにやってきたツィツィー。しかしガイゼルを前にしたとき、ツィツィーの心に流れ込んできたのは、孤独な皇帝の意外過ぎる「本心」で――?

altTitles.ja: アイアムアヒーロー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

altTitles.ja: 星野くん、したがって！

description.ar: روم-كوم عن صبي مدرسة ثانوية خجول ولطيف من مدرسة البيسبول يلتقي بطالبة منتقلة جديدة بمفردها. فيعلم عن تعرضها للاعتداء ولكن بطريقة ما تبدو هذه الفتاة غريبة نوعًا ما لأنها فجأةً طلبت منه المال لمساعدتها!
description.en: Hoshino, a member of the baseball club meets Yamada, a classmate who has just transferred to his new school. She cries loudly that she was "mugged" and makes a certain "request" to him. The world's funniest master-slave relationship between a clueless girl and a good-natured little guy is about to begin.

In Izina, a country in the outskirts of a large continent, lives Princess Maeve. A rare sight to see, Princess Maeve, is a Playgirl. She sleeps with almost every man she sees. But while out to look for her next prey, her eyes falls on Prince Carlyn of Guorango. Next thing you know, she proceeds to sleep with him too! But to her surprise, the "Prince" is actually a "Princess"!! What will happen after this?

---

- [Original Webtoon <Peanutoon>](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/2151)

- [Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/n_prince/?p_id=YumGumYum)

- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_prince_wz)

- [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/libertine_and_prince)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3801915)
description.ko:
변방의 소국 아이지나에는 희대의 난봉꾼인 메이브 공주가 산다. 메이브 공주는 어느날 그란고의 칼린 왕자와 하룻밤을 보내에 되고, 그가 왕자가 아닌 공주라는 비밀을 알게 되는데..

---

- [Original Webtoon <Peanutoon>](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/2151)

- [Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/n_prince/?p_id=YumGumYum)

- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_prince_wz)

- [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/libertine_and_prince)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3801915)

title.en: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World

altTitles.en: Modern Man Falling Into the World of Murim
A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated to Murim

altTitles.es-la: Un hombre moderno en el Murim

description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Neng Fu Zhi Tian Fu

description.en: The young man Ye Tian obtains the ability to copy the talents of others, and now fights against the heavens to change his fate. He struggles to survive and protect his sister from the apocalypse of the alien beast invasion. In order to become stronger, he begins to explore the unknown world, and gradually reveals the secret behind the invasion of the alien dimensions…

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

description.en: A transmigration out of the blue and he had reincarnated as the Eldest Crown Prince of the Eastern Dragon Palace, Ao Fan. He had to inherit the Eastern Dragon Palace and become the next Eastern Dragon King. At the time of the crisis, Ao Fan discovered the existence of the system and activated it which brings him lots of items and points! "Deities killing one another, fighting anyone I meet on the way. I'll defeat anyone who refuses to comply with me!" He swore to lead the Dragon Clan to rise again and contend for hegemony among the divine investitures!
A ghost has a story. The story is about his friendship, love, losses and experiences. His name is Andy and he really wants to share this story with you.
description.ru: У одного призрака есть история. История о его дружбе, любви, потерях и переживаниях. Его имя Энди и он очень хочет поделиться этой историей с вами.

altTitles.ja: ヒモクズ花くんは死にたがり

altTitles.en: Deadbeat Hana-kun Has a Death Wish

altTitles.zh-hk: 軟飯人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.zh: 软饭人渣小花想要去死

description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

altTitles.ja: バキ道

description.en: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.
description.ru: Продолжение серии манги Бойца Баки. После "победы" над воскрешённым "богом меча" Миямото Мусаси в этот раз история столкнёт главных персонажей с потомком "бога сумо" и его бандой сумоистов.
description.tr: 2000 yıldan fazla bir süre sonra, Nomi no Sukune'nin halefi doğuyor. Bu kez, Baki sumo tanrısına meydan okuyacak.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

description.en: A woman (Gasolina) and her dog (Krunk) travel through an ecologically hazardous post apocalyptic America.

title.en: Transmigrating to the Otherworld Once More

altTitles.ru: Войдите в потусторонний мир с перезагрузкой

altTitles.en: Returning to the Otherworld Once More

altTitles.es-la: Transmigrando al otro mundo una vez mas

description.en:
When the King’s Heart burns down, a being that transcends the fate of this world will arrive on this land!

The boy from Earth, Sung Sihan, brought down a tyrant and saved the world.

However, his happy ending was cut short when everything was taken away from him, and he was banished back to Earth.

After 10 years of gritting his teeth, he prepares for his return…

The hero who has already saved the world once re-enters Terranora!
description.ko:
왕의 심장이 불타 사라질 때, 현세의 운명을 초월한 존재가 이 땅에 강림하리라! 
폭군을 쓰러트리고 이세계를 구원한 지구인 소년 성시한. 
부와 명예, 아름다운 연인… 해피엔딩으로 이야기는 끝인 줄 알았건만, 그 대가는 목숨 걸고 이룩한 모든 걸 빼앗기고 지구로 추방되는 것이었다. 
이에 시한은 10년의 절치부심 끝에 테라노어로 되돌아오게 되는데… 한 번 세상을 구한 영웅의 이계 ‘재’진입 이야기!

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story: Year One

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentosakaeda)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/goblinyo/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://yenpress.com/series-search/?series=yen346-goblin-slayer-side-story-year-one-light-novel)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.

description.en: Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

altTitles.ja: 刃牙らへん

description.en: The sixth part of the Baki series.
description.ru: Продолжение великой эпопеи "Баки". 6-я номерная серия тайтла, которая поведает нам нереальную историю сражения Джека Хаммера и доисторического человека Пикла!!!
description.tr: Büyük destan Bucky'nin devamı. Jack Hammer ve tarih öncesi adam Pickle arasındaki savaşın gerçek dışı hikayesini anlatacak olan Baki'nin 6 numaralı serisidir!!!
description.pt-br: Jack derrubou o mundo do sumô, agora ele irá desafiar a todos para seu torneio. Desta vez uma nova jornada.

title.en: I’m So Hungry I Could Eat Basashi

altTitles.ja: 馬刺しが食べたい

description.en: Kaede, a high school student, has won first place in an art contest with a painting of her favorite food, basashi. The painting was hung up at her school, making her instantly become the talk of the town. Even the scary-looking boy, Satomi, has taken notice of her work. Satomi actually has a secret he can't tell anyone…! Could basashi really be the thing that brings these two together?!

altTitles.ja: 夏の終点

description.en: Natsukawa, a member of the beautification committee, often finds her gaze lingering on her schoolmate Aihara. One fateful day off, she spots Aihara walking alongside another girl... As summer’s heat stirs the air, a delicate tale of first love begins to take shape...

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

title.en: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru

altTitles.ja: 売られた辺境伯令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighbouring Country
The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country

altTitles.zh: 被卖掉的的边境伯爵大小姐却被邻国王太子所溺爱

altTitles.zh-hk: 被賣掉的的邊境伯爵大小姐卻被鄰國王太子所溺愛

description.en:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!

title.en: See You Tomorrow At The Food Court.

altTitles.es-la: Hasta mañana en la plaza de comidas
Nos vemos mañana en la plaza de comidas
Te veo mañana en la plaza de comidas

altTitles.ja: フードコートで、また明日。
フードコートで女子高生が喋るだけ

altTitles.en: See You at the Food Court Tomorrow.

description.en: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.
description.es-la:
Yamamoto y Wada son dos amigas de la infancia que atienden diferentes escuelas preparatorias y que se reúnen todas las tardes en la plaza de comidas del centro comercial local para tener charlas encantadoramente mundanas.  
  
[Author Twitter](https://twitter.com/_71416)

altTitles.ja: 1円の男

description.en: A very rude but good looking banker named Ryo Masaki seeks the help of poor detective Keisuke Sanjo. This is the first client that he has seen in a very long time… what could he need?
description.pl: Pewnego razu, niezwykle nieuprzejmy, ale bardzo przystojny pracownik banku, Masaki Ryo skonsultował się w pewnej sprawie z detektywem Sanjou Keisuke. Masaki, który został oszukany i zdradzony przez faceta, zapytał Sanjo: „Ile mam Ci zapłacić, żebyś się ze mną przespał?”. Jaka będzie odpowiedź Sanjo? Pierwsza manga BL Monden Akiko, romantyczna komedia rozgrywająca się między hetero-detektywem, a tsundere pracownikiem banku!
description.pt-br: Um banqueiro muito rude, mas de boa aparência chamado Ryou Masaki procura a ajuda do pobre detetive Keisuke Sanjo. Este é o primeiro cliente assim que ele vê em muito tempo … o que ele poderia precisar?

altTitles.ja: フェイト／アポクリファ

description.en:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: События Fate/Apocrypha происходят в мире параллельном миру Fate/stay night, в котором Грааль был убран из города Фуюки после Третьей Войны. История начинается с того, что в Румынии был обнаружен «726-ой Святой Грааль». Его похитила и привезла в Румынию семья Иггдмилленния. Это знаменует начало Великой Войны Святого Грааля в городе Трифас с двумя противоборствующими сторонами: Чёрная Фракция, члены которой являются частью семьи Иггдмилленния и Красная Фракция, члены которой были посланы Ассоциацией Магов, за исключением одного участника от Церкви. Грааль также призывает Рулера выступать в качестве посредника в Войне Святого Грааля.
description.vi:
Nội dung của Fate/Apocrypha vẫn xoay quanh Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh tại thành phố Fuyuki nhưng diễn ra trong một thế giới song song với thế giới của Fate/Stay Night. Tại đây, sau Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh lần thứ 3, Đại Chén Thánh của thành phố Fuyuki đã đột ngột biến mất một cách bí ẩn.

Rất lâu sau đó, vào thời điểm những năm 2000, một gia tộc mang tên gọi Yggdmilennia đã công khai việc đánh cắp Chén Thánh của họ đồng thời tách rời khỏi Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư. Để đoạt lại Chén Thánh, Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư đã cử đi 50 thành viên tinh nhuệ nhất của mình nhưng tất cả đều bị Servant Lancer của nhà Yggdmilennia tiêu diệt. Tuy nhiên, người sống sót cuối cùng trong 50 pháp sư đã kịp kích hoạt cơ chế dự phòng của Đại Chén Thánh, được sử dụng nhằm ngăn chặn sự hợp tác giữa các Servant bằng cách cho phép 7 Master và 7 Servant mới được tham gia vào trận chiến. Từ đó mở màn cho cuộc Đại Chiến Chén Thánh với 14 Master cùng 14 Servant tại thành phố Trifas giữa Hắc Trận Doanh – những thành viên của gia tộc Yggdmilennia và Xích Trận Doanh – những Master đại diện cho Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư.

title.en: The Holy Power of Modern Medicine

altTitles.en: To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor

description.en:
Jin Yoosung was a gifted surgeon said to be able to bring the dead back to life. However, not even this genius doctor had the ability to revive himself. Following a fatal car crash, Yoosung closed his eyes for what he'd thought was the last time… only to wake up and find that he's been reborn in a fantasy world!

A doctor through and through, Yoosung — now Ray — resolves to become a healer again. Unfortunately, it seems his new magical abilities may not be the most fitting for his dream career…
description.ko:
천재 의사로 의학계에 이름을 떨치던 유성.
수술실을 집처럼 여기던 그는 어느 날 교통사고로 죽게 되고,
정신을 차려 보니 다른 세계로 떨어져 버렸다.

그런데.
성녀…성국…힐링 마법이라고?

"내가 얼마나 힘들게 의학을 배웠는데, 손만 대 놓고 치료 끝?
아, 나. 진짜 미쳐버리겠네."
description.pt-br:
Yusung é um médico genial e famoso no mundo da medicina. Sua vida é dedicada à sala de cirurgia, mas tudo muda quando ele morre em um acidente de trânsito e, ao acordar, se vê em um mundo completamente diferente. Nesse novo mundo, existe uma santa e um império sagrado, e a magia de cura é uma realidade. 
Para Yusung, que passou toda a sua vida estudando medicina, é difícil acreditar que agora tudo o que ele precisa fazer é tocar em alguém para curá-lo. É uma experiência surreal que o faz questionar sua sanidade.

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: あくまであまい私の彼女

description.ja: 甘いものが大好きな女の子・天井真衣は、付き合っていた彼女に振られて傷心中。ある日、勤務先のカフェの新人としてやってきた美少女・黒崎梨々に一目惚れをするも、なんと彼女は"サキュバス"という悪魔で……？パフェもあなたも食べちゃいたい♡ ポップでキュートな悪魔ティックガールズラブコメ、スタート！

title.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ja: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

altTitles.zh-hk: 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了

altTitles.en: The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me
An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ko: 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**

- [Official Video Manga](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Learn Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhēn Bù Xiǎng Xué Jìn Zhòu
Wo Zhen Bu Xiang Xue Jin Zhou

description.en:
For Ning Feng, an infamous underachiever, this will be his third time taking the awakening exam.  When he awakens as a one-star -- the lowest possible rating -- everyone laughs.  He can't understand why his new skills talk about "forbidden spells" and "dark power."  
He isn't an evil dark lord, but wow!  Who knew forbidden spells could be so powerful!  These skills are so cool, but they emit tons of dark power. 
There's a new source of dark power in the city and Ning Feng must get stronger before anyone realizes that its him.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

altTitles.ja: ゴールデンスパークル

description.en: With an absent father and having had a traumatic experience in pre-school, Himari Uehara has problems dealing with girls, and knows nothing about sexuality. He joins a boys-only high school, makes a good friend, and his now happy school life is marred only by the disconcerting changes in his body. His new friend, Gaku Asada, realizing Himari's ignorance, offers to teach Himari how to take care of his male physical needs…
description.tr:
Lise birinci sınıf öğrencisi Himari Uehara, seks hakkında çok az bilgiye sahip… Babası evde olmayan ve ortaokulda verilen sağlık dersinden kaytaran Himari, boxerıyla beklemediği bir durumda uyanır ve bu konuda tavsiye verecek kimsesi olmadığından kafası karışır. Neyse ki Himari, ona sağlık dersinde kaçırdığı her şeyi ve hatta daha fazlasını öğretmeyi teklif eden yeni arkadaşı Gaku Asada'ya sahip…   
(Luna Scans TR)

description.en:
The Digimon card game has evolved.
After a year-long closed beta test, "Digimon Liberator," a futuristic and fully immersive game that allows players to enjoy card battles in the metaverse space of Lacuna, has finally been officially launched.

Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win a card battle because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the world of Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

Encounters with wild Digimon. Battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion.

This is a story about "Digimon" and the "world".

altTitles.ja: 俺以外全員帰還者な件

altTitles.vi: Trừ Tôi Tất Cả Đều Là Quy Hồi Giả

description.en:
Average college student Yoo Ilhan has always gone through life without being noticed by anyone, even God!

So when monsters were about to invade Earth and God sent all humans to other dimensions to train with mana... he forgot Ilhan and left him on Earth for 1,000 years!

Realizing his mistake, God sends the straggler two angels to assist him as he takes on the monsters, eventually turning him into an unstoppable force.

Now that people have returned to Earth, will Ilhan finally be seen?
description.ko:
태생적 외톨이, 낙오자의 삶에서
이번에는 신도 파악하지 못할 은신술로 전 인류에서 낙오하게 된다.

“왜 나만 빠진 거예요? 왜 나만 이 꼴이 된 거죠?”

[다른 세계로 가는 인류 명단을 작성하던 신께서 끝내 당신을 찾지 못했습니다. 실로 경이로운 은신술이라고 말씀하셨죠.]

그렇게 인류가 다시 돌아오기 전까지
태생적 외톨이, 유일한의 나 홀로 지구 생활이 시작되었다.

그리고 천 년의 시간이 흐르고, 인류는 지구로 귀환했다.
그리고 유일한은 인류 최강이 되어 있었는데...

altTitles.ja: 極東ネクロマンス

description.en: One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

Once upon a time, a selfish king summoned the monstrous Bulkirin into the real world. The monster killed half of all human beings, leaving the rest helpless as to what to do. That is, until one day when a hero appeared and defeated the Bulkirin with the legendary ”Seven Blade Sword.” But…what does all this have to do with 8th grader Eun-Gyo Sung?! First, she gets suspended from school for fighting. Then, she runs away from home. The last thing she needed was to be kidnapped — and whisked into the past by a mysterious stranger named No-Ah!
description.ko:
평범한 여중생 성은교. 
과거에서 온 노아에게 영문도 모른 채 납치당한다. 
은교는 노아와 함께 그의 동생을 구하기 위해 과거로 들어가는데!! 
그들 앞에 나타난 역사 속의 인물인 [낙랑공주]와 [호동왕자]는 우리가 익히 알고 있던 연인사이가 아닌 사뭇 다른 관계?!!

altTitles.ja: ナメ。

description.en:
A high school boy is secretly cheating on his new cute girlfriend with another girl who likes to lick sweat off his body. 
To you who have tongue licking and sweat fetish, this series is perfect for you

In the year 202X, the Otherworlders invaded Earth. The otherworlders have more sophisticated technology and hunted down humans with combat robots and viral weapons, and the remaining humans battled on for 10 years just to survive.
The main character, ‘Park Sung Hyun’, was the leader of the troops in Incheon, Bupyeong. Prior to the invasion of the Otherworlders, he used to be a part-timer at a convenience store like an ordinary person, but he became a strong warrior in the process of losing his family and battling to avenge them.
In the midst of the attack against the Otherworlders’ headquarters, Park Hyun Sung got trapped in a warp portal with the leader. When he woke up, he found himself in a fantasy world that reminded him of the medieval times in Europe, and his soul was trapped inside a weak blonde 15-year-old pretty boy’s body.
Hyun Sung was surprised by the unfamiliar surroundings and his weak body and found out that he is occupying the body of Ian Albarren, and that his father is the lord of a land who owes a large debt to the great lord and faces a difficult time ruling over his land.
Park Hyun Sung, who had been fighting against combat robots and viral weaponry from the Otherworlders who had advanced scientific technology, decides to get used to this fantasy world to fight against monsters with armor and swords.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B0%91%EC%A7%88%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EC%98%81%EC%A3%BC%EB%8B%98/2850)
description.ko:
202X년 지구에는 이계인들의 침공이 벌어졌다.
지구보다 앞선 기술력을 갖춘 이계인들은
전투 로봇과 생체병기로 인류를 사냥했고,
살아남은 인류들은 생존을 위해 10년 동안 힘겨운 싸움을 해왔다.

주인공 ‘박현성’은 인천 부평지역 민병대의 대장이다.
그는 이계인들의 침략이 있기 전에는
평범한 편의점 아르바이트생이었지만,
가족을 잃고 복수를 위한 싸움을 계속하는 과정 속에서
강인한 전사로 성장한 것이다.

박현성은 부대원들을 이끌고 이계인의 본거지를 공략하던 도중,
워프를 통해 탈출하려는 이계인의 우두머리와 함께
포탈에 휩쓸려 들어간다.
정신을 차려보니 박현성은 중세의 유럽을 연상시키는
판타지 세계에서 깨어났고,
박현성의 영혼은 15세의 병약한 금발 미소년
귀족의 몸 안에 들어가 있었다.

현성은 낯선 상황과 나약한 육체에 당황했지만,
이내 자신의 이름이 이안 알베른이며
아버지가 선대 영주가 대영주에게 진 막대한 빚으로 인해
살림이 어려워진 영지의 영주라는 사실을 알게 된다.

지난 10년간 고도의 과학기술력을 가진
이계인의 전투로봇과 생체병기와 싸워오던 박현성은
검과 갑옷을 두르고 몬스터와 싸워야하는
판타지 세계에 적응하기로 마음먹는다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B0%91%EC%A7%88%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EC%98%81%EC%A3%BC%EB%8B%98/2850)

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?
